channel.title: Changing Experiance speed--BERKY-SCAPE SERVER BASE!
channel.description: Hey i need to learn how to make training for stats faster. I just downloaded Berky-Scape and its rate is slow.I love the server tho :D so i want to just change that. I know the basics of coding but ive never actully done it so if someone can tell me how , that will be sweet :D

Berky-Scape the stuff isnt the same :(…If any1 knows or has another tut link good or berky please post Thanks
